revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Dynalink |model=RTA1025W |revision= |asin= |est_release_date=06/2008 |fcc_date= |availability=now |is_manuf=No |manuf=Askey |manuf_model=RTA1025W |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6348 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |serial= |jtag= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4318 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325E |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=ADSL Line Driver;Broadcom;BCM6301KSG;;1; |flags=ADSL2+ |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=RTA1025W-XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^RTA1025W-[0-9A-F]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|ADSL2+ Wireless Router}} :[http://www.netcomm.co.nz/products/adsl/rta1025w Support page] {{•}} [http://media.netcomm.com.au/public/assets/pdf_file/0020/18173/RTA1025W_UG.pdf Manual]
The default SSID appears to be '''RTA1025W-XXXXXX''', where '''XXXXXX''' is the last :three octets of the wireless interface MAC address (upper case letters).
Has same hardware as [[NetComm NB6Plus4W]] and [[ZTE ZXDSL 531BII]] :(but different casing).
Per [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=678128 this post on the DD-WRT forums], this device uses BCM6348.
*[http://bc.whirlpool.net.au/bc/hardware/?action=h_view&model_id=379 ''Dynalink RTA1025W'' on '''whirlpool.net.au''']
